animal.question: I say 'Moo!' and give you milk. Who am I?

hints.text: I live on a farm.
I have black and white spots.
I eat grass.

animal.question: I say 'Meow!' and like to play with yarn. Who am I?

hints.text: I love to chase mice.
I purr when you pet me.
I drink milk.

animal.question: I say 'Woof!' and wag my tail. Who am I?

hints.text: I love to play fetch.
I guard your house.
I have four legs.

animal.question: I say 'Quack!' and swim in the pond. Who am I?

hints.text: I have a flat beak.
I like to swim in the water.
I eat plants and bugs.

animal.question: I hop around and love to eat carrots. Who am I?

hints.text: I have long ears.
I live in a burrow.
I like to eat leafy greens.

animal.question: I carry my house on my back. Who am I?

hints.text: I move very slowly.
I like to eat leaves in the garden.
I come out after it rains.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. Who am I?

hints.text: I am very big.
I love to eat peanuts.
I live in Africa and Asia.

animal.question: I roar very loudly and I am the king of the jungle. Who am I?

hints.text: I have a big mane.
I eat meat.
I am yellow-ish brown.

animal.question: I swing from trees and love to eat bananas. Who am I?

hints.text: I have a long tail.
I live in the jungle.
I love to eat yellow fruit.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and run very fast. Who am I?

hints.text: I live in Africa.
I eat grass.
I look like a horse.
